phase.1: Describe an item that you own that you would want to keep if you moved.
phase.2: Now, from the items you see, which item do you think everyone would want to keep?
phase.3: OK. So...what items would you want to toss?

phase.1: It's time for the final round. We found some space! What items do you want to save?
phase.2: Finally...what items do you think you all will *actually* save?
